title: (x) Alka Seltzer logo - Optima {Kate McDonnell}
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used for Alka-Seltzer?

much appreciated
author: 400Designers

comments.content: I Google-imaged for it, and my impression is it's a somewhat logotyped version of [Optima black italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130305023948/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/black-italic/).
